title: Drawing, "Sketches of Soldiers and Trees", 1862
medium: Graphite,  brush and gray wash on paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of soldiers gathered about a fire, with tent and trees in the background.

Verso:  Vertical view of faint sketches of soldiers and trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches of Soldiers and Trees", 1862.
1862. Graphite,  brush and gray wash on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-123-a.
